feed.title: Wanderlust Minimalist
feed.subtitle: A collection of stories of a wanderlust minimalist.

entry.title: Beginnings
entry.summary: “The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, nor to worry about the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly.” Hello, everyone! I’m thrilled to kick off my blog, “Wanderlust Minimalist.” Here, I’m all about embracing the beauty of minimalism, relishing diverse culinary delights, embarking on thrilling travel adventures, diving into languages, ...
